Posts.Content: How was your FNA hon? Hope you're okay. xx
Posts.Title: Complex Mass - Biopsy Scheduled

Posts.Content:
Hi hon. I would tell your doctor everything you have said here. Doctors are here for us to talk to, and they should listen, and address all (not some) of your concerns. You should feel satisfied that all of your questions were appropriately addressed when you leave the office. If you're not comfortable with your doctor, you can always get a second opinion. 
I think that it's great though that there was nothing that was suspicious for malignancy on your mammogram. That's wonderful! Please though--tell your doctor about
 the lump on your collarbone. It's better to have peace of mind, than to stress and worry.
Posts.Title: breast cyst so i was told

Posts.Content: Ahh...you have a family history too. I think it's good that your doctor is investigating this. How was your appointment hon? Hope you're okay. Please check in here when you're able. xxoo
Posts.Title: Inverted nipples

Posts.Content: Just want to put this out there--a lump can feel moveable and be malignant. Imaging is needed when you find a new lump that does not go away.
